titles.title: Fort Omaha Land Exchange Act of 2022
Fort Omaha Land Exchange Act of 2022
To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to convey the Marine Reserve Training Center in Omaha, Nebraska, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Fort Omaha Land Exchange Act of 2022
This bill authorizes the Department of the Navy to exchange specified land with the Metropolitan Community College Area (a political subdivision of Nebraska). The Navy must require the college to pay all costs incurred to carry out the exchange of property.
